name: worker-transacao
description: worker para execucao de transacao de compra de ingressos

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir ./dist/app && mkdir ./dist/config
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-config && npm run build-app && npm run build-worker
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/*.js --require babel-register --reporter spec || exit 0

author: igorgcosta
